## ComponentManager.removeComponent() method

Removes a component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeComponent(id: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID of the component to remove. |

void
